name: SugarYield
description: SugarYield is an Insurance protocol allow users to speculate on pegged assets. Sugaryield has first mover advantage in bsc echosystem to provide cutting edge solution for stable coins believer's, we have indirect (CEX) competitors like, margin and future trading. Our mobile application is live and main-net smart contracts are integrated. Users can predict stable coins by investing sugar tokens in our vaults based on that they will win or lose. Sugar holders can also enjoy good return in our sugar farms.
